arts.ttl: Newcastle's full-time reaction should worry Chelsea as Wolves rage at Tindall
arts.sum: Isak was a long way from goal out on the left, but wary Wolves defenders backed off, allowing the lethal Newcastle striker to cut inside and carry the ball to the edge of the area. Yet it said it all that players and staff alike recognised that Newcastle can play even better following a 3-0 win against Wolves at St James' Park .

arts.ttl: Newcastle United spying mission sheds light on £50million target
arts.sum: The Magpies like Bryan Mbeumo and the fact that Nickson was in attendance to run the rule over the 13-goal forward is a positive sign ahead of the summer. Bees boss Thomas Frank has already ruled that out and said this week "No. So, very easy to answer that question!" Frank had also stated he expects Mbeumo to go at some stage though.

arts.ttl: FPL notes: Isak + Cunha minutes, Palace assets deliver
arts.sum: Notes from two of Wednesday's games The post FPL notes: Isak + Cunha minutes, Palace assets deliver appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Newcastle United's Marcus Rashford 'swap deal' amid Alexander Isak proposal and Italian 'scouting'
arts.sum: Former Manchester United defender Gary Pallister has urged the Reds to try and sign Newcastle United striker Alexander Isak in the coming months with a view to Marcus Rashford heading to St. James' Park Though there continues to be speculation linking the likes of Alexander Isak with a move away from St. James' Park, the reality of a January transfer move for the Swedish striker is highly unlikely.

arts.ttl: FPL GW21 stats: Gordon scores as Newcastle trio delight new owners
arts.sum: For the second successive Gameweek, three Newcastle United players featured among the top five recruits, as Gordon was joined by team-mates Alexander Isak (£9.3m) and Lewis Hall (£4.9m). All three produced returns in Newcastle's 3-0 win over Wolverhampton Wanderers with Isak totalling 16 points courtesy of two goals, an assist and maximum bonus, and Hall coming away with six points thanks to his eighth clean sheet of the season.

arts.ttl: Newcastle winger Miguel Almiron enters talks to rejoin former club in £8m deal after falling out of favour under Eddie Howe
arts.sum: Brazilian teams Santos, Palmeiras and Sao Paulo have all been monitoring his situation, while Olympiacos and MLS side Charlotte FC have also enquired about Almiron's availability.

arts.ttl: Howe hails Isak's 'composure' as striker scores again
arts.sum: Newcastle United head coach Eddie Howe praises the "composure and finishing" of Alexander Isak, who scored twice in a 3-0 Premier League win against Wolves - the Magpies' ninth successive win.

arts.ttl: Isak in 'red-hot form' as Newcastle 'story keeps building'
arts.sum: With Alexander Isak in "red-hot form" and Newcastle on a club record-equalling winning run, what can they achieve this season?

arts.ttl: Wolves boss Vitor Pereira reveals Mario Lemina wants to LEAVE after being left out of defeat by Newcastle - after the midfielder was stripped of the captaincy following on-pitch scuffle with Jarrod Bowen last month
arts.sum: Lemina missed Wolves' 3-0 defeat by Newcastle on Wednesday night as Pereira suffered just his second loss in six games since replacing Gary O'Neil.

arts.ttl: Eddie Howe praises ‘class’ of Alexander Isak as goalscoring run continues
arts.sum: Isak became the first Magpies player to score in eight successive Premier League games.
